episodes.title: The Church of the Almighty God Cult: Jesus Reborn as a Chinese woman?
episodes.description:
Hey history lovers! Welcome back to Immersive History and The Church of the Almighty God Cult: Jesus Reborn as a Chinese woman. Today we dive into the story about The church of the almighty God cult or Eastern Lighting if you will. The Church of the Almighty God is a Chinese Christian cult known for its extreme beliefs and practices. Church by name and cult by nature, this organization has been causing chaos and destruction since its inception in 1991. Is Jesus reincarnated as a chinese woman? This is just one of the beliefs of the chinese cult. 

If you're interested in learning more about one of history's most notorious cults, then this video is for you! Eastern Lighting is known for their brainwashing, kidnapping and blackmailing to retain their members. Want to learn more about the horrifying cult? Watch the video and don't forget to comment and subscribe! Enjoy this weeks video! 
✅SUBSCRIBE NOW : https://shorturl.at/jmxGV
